title: Matchmaker at work
brief_description: Outlines recent developments in the CRA group, including: - establishment of Hamersley’s second mine complex at Paraburdoo; the Bougainville Copper operation; Comalco’s integrated aluminium group, and integration of lead zinc interests into Australian Mining and Smelting.
